Name: Encore Classic Card Games
About the game: Ready to get in the game? Then pull up a chair and deal yourself in! Large cards, fast game play and an easy-to-navigate user interface makes Encore Classic Card Games entertaining and fun. The deck is stacked in your favor with quick game play, so take a break from everyday hustle and that tedious treadmill. Don't wait until Friday night to play your favorite card games, purchase Encore Classic Cards today and get in the game! Game Features: Create Your Own Player! Be the star you are! Choose your hair style, face shape, eye color and outfit. With FaceCreator, you can change your look as quickly as you change your mind. Compete with Different Characters And ''characters'' they are ... so many different personalities to chose from, from a trash-talking dinosaur to a Vegas taxi cab driver and everything in between. Each character has unique strengths, so choose wisely! In-Game Currency Encore Bucks Shop 'till you drop with this in-game currency. The more you play, the more you earn! Customize Your Experience With over 35 card backs and 4 card fonts, you can customize your cards to match your mood. Escape in the customizable background and toe-tappin' music. Adjustable Difficulty Levels Hone your skills with the adjustable difficulty levels. Keep up the challenge by choosing difficult levels as you keep improving. Play All These Great Games! Blackjack Bridge Canasta Crazy Eights Cribbage Euchre Go Fish Hearts Pinochle Poker Skat Solitaire Spades Spite and Malice War and more!
